info.name: First Room
info.description: A helpful room with doors in every possible direction.

doors.n: A knobbly wooden door with a rough carving or a friendly face
doors.w: A fake wooden door with stickers of friendly faces plastered all over it
doors.s: A warped wooden door with a friendly face branded on the corner
doors.e: A polished wooden door with an inlaid friendly face
doors.u: A scuffed and scratched oaken trap door embossed with a friendly face
doors.d: A rough-cut particle board hatch with a friendly face scratched on it
